description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in Windows Remote Access Connection Manager (CVE-2024-38240):

1. Download the relevant update packages specific to your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system is updated with one of the following KB articles based on your build version:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: KB5043080
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5043076
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: KB5043076
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2: KB5043067
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5043064
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2: KB5043064
3. Restart your system after installing the updates to apply the changes effectively.

**Details**:
This update resolves an elevation of privilege vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
- For more information, refer to the update packages:
  - [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080)
  - [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
  - [KB5043067](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043067)
  - [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064)
Note: Ensure you have backups and the latest drivers installed before applying the updates.
